nodes.text: Attahox was an astronomical object in the galaxy's Expansion Region. It was connected to Mimban and Nanth'ri by a hyperspace route.

Attahox was first created by Alan Moore for The Pandora Effect, a Star Wars Legends comic strip published in The Empire Strikes Back Monthly 151 magazine in 1981. It was confirmed to be canon when shown on a galactic map included in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game released by Fantasy Flight Games for their roleplaying system in 2016.
